front.title: Bundle Protocol Erasure Coding Basic Objects

abstract.t: This document defines the Basic Data Objects formats for the Erasure Coding Extension [ErasureCoding] to the Delay and Disruption Tolerant Network (DTN) Bundle Protocol [RFC5050]. The File Data Object format is used to store a binary file and includes metadata for the file name and path name. The Bundle Data Object format is used to store a large DTN Bundle and to map its implicit Transfer Specification to the headers of the Encoding Bundles.
